Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: No trains between Forest Park and Austin
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and Austin due to police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Forest Park and Austin due to police investigation.

As a result, trains are operating only between O'Hare and Austin at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Forest Park and Austin in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #7 Harrison, #50 Damen, or the #49 Western bus. 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Yellow Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier signal problems at Howard. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier signal problems at Howard.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running with delays due to signal problems; we're working to run as much service as possible. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running with delays due to signal problems

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at California. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at California. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
